mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_province, recv_city, recv_area, recv_address, total_price, order_time, pay_time, status, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvProvince}, #{recvCity}, #{recvArea}, #{recvAddress}, #{totalPrice}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{status}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( oid, pid, title, image, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{pid}, #{title}, #{image}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
